issue.title: [C++] Add `Grouper::Reset`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18311](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18311). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding `Grouper::Reset` will enable it to be reused in segmented streaming. `See [this post](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14352#discussion_r1016640969).
